Articles.Content: So I was messing with the debug menu and I changed values on basically all fronts. I don't know the originals and I couldn't find a website or forum that had them. I tried deleting the physics.cfg but I still don't think they're right. I wish there was a button to reset them all to normal.

Hi HeroOfJews, likely they aren't right as 1.0.4 doesn't replace the Physics.cfg with the correct values.

But you can find a link to the correct file in the linux thread here.

Just replace your current Physics.cfg with this one and it'll be back to the defaults.
